name: Lowshore Plains
role_in_state: Provision and material staging area for fleet and trade
culture_adjustments: More kin-based flood-time mutual aid than shipwright guild authority
Stronger ancestor-line ceremonies tied to harvest and ebb tides
Riveric dialectal influence on Coastal Tongues vocabulary
Practical syncretism: simple maritime rites adapted for inland marsh work
constraints: Shallow, silty waterways limit deep-draft shipyards
Ritual magic consumes imported reagents; storage vulnerability
notes: Key seasonal supplier to State_10 fleets and merchant convoys
Reedbeds supply low-tech sail and thatch materials used statewide
Customary community-led flood relief labor is politically stabilizing
